description:
Vinny is back! This 20 year old chiseled athlete is one helluva hot stud. This time, he's in even better shape, and has a nice summer tan to go along with it.
Watch Vinny treat us to 3 scenes: in the living room, the kitchen, and then finally in bed. One thing we think you'll really enjoy is when he finally gets off and cums. You can really tell that he is one happy stud at the end of it all.
We hope you enjoy Vinny as much as he enjoyed himself.
title: Vinny
